mapper.insert: insert into members_table (memberId, memberPassword, memberName, memberDept, memberPosition, memberJoinDate, memberIdNum, memberBirthDay, memberAddress, memberEmail, memberMobile, memberProfileName) values (#{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberDept}, #{memberPosition}, now(), #{memberIdNum}, #{memberBirthDay}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberMobile}, #{memberProfileName})
